t: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. A maskil of David. When the Ziphites had gone to Saul and said, “Is not David hiding among us?”
Save*pn me, O God, by your name; vindicate*ld me by your might.
Hear*ln my prayer, O God; listen*ld to the words of my mouth.
Arrogant*pn foes are attacking me; ruthless*ld people are trying to kill me— people*ld without regard for God.
Surely*pn God is my help; the*ld Lord is the one who sustains me.
Let*pn evil recoil on those who slander me; in*ld your faithfulness destroy them.
I*pn will sacrifice a freewill offering to you; I*ld will praise your name, Lord,*s for it is good.
You*ln have delivered me from all my troubles, and*ld my eyes have looked in triumph on my foes.
